proShop.title: Pro Shop
proShop.description: Our on-site pro shop carries equipment, apparel, and accessories for tennis and pickleball players. We also offer professional racquet stringing services.

bar.title: The Final Set Bar & Lounge
bar.description: Unwind after your match or workout at The Final Set, our full-service bar and lounge. Catch the game on our HDTVs, grab a drink, and enjoy the company of fellow members.

birthdayParties.title: Birthday Parties
birthdayParties.description: Celebrate your next birthday at Pleasant Valley! We offer court time and a dedicated party room for a fun, active celebration.
